pages.text: Polymorph must be one of the most versatile effects. Players under the Polymorph effect change their form into the target of the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() used.$(br2)The Brew can be made into a Splash Potion or similar variants, just like other brews.

pages.title: Polymorph
pages.text: Intensity does not have an effect on this potion.$(br2)This potion only works if created from a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() of another player.
